title: Peoples Press (Port Arthur, Texas)
text: The Peoples Press was a weekly newspaper in <a href="Port%20Arthur%2C%20Texas">Port Arthur, Texas</a>, published from 1932 until 1941. Its circulation was reported as 1,500 for 1933-39 and 2,500 for 1940–41. The editor was <a href="Carl%20White%20%28editor%29">Carl White</a>, who was previously the editor of <a href="Peoples%20Press%20%28Port%20Neches%2C%20Texas%29">Peoples Press</a> in <a href="Port%20Neches%2C%20Texas">Port Neches</a> from 1925 until 1931.
